item.description:
Our own local Mystery Ride!!!!!

This is Halloween day,,,,,,ride in your costume!!!!!

See details on calendar at www.newenglandthunder.com website


Following our ride Karen has invited us to come to her house anytime after 5 (in your costume if you want) because she has lots of kids she has to hand candy out to. If you don't give out candy at your house, you can help scare the ones in her neighborhood. Bring snacks and BYOB

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA

item.name: Monster Mash
